message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SI, cs.DB, cs.LG, cs.CY 

This paper discusses Location Privacy-Preserving Mechanisms (LPPM) in the context of mobile devices and Location-Based Services (LBS), which are typically studied in the computer security (cs.CR) and information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-categories. The paper also discusses statistical models and the leakage of privacy, which are relevant to the machine learning (cs.LG) and databases (cs.DB) sub-categories. Finally, the paper introduces a novel solution, which involves randomization, that could be considered a form of cryptography (cs.CY).
